title: Paper Doll Costume, "Paper Doll Costume with Muff and Blue Cloak", 1840–60
medium: Engraving with brush and watercolor on paper (machine cut?)
description: Paper doll costume with blue cloak trimmed in lace, light purple full skirt and ermine (?) muff. Costume is two-ply, with a front and back piece, and is open at the neck and bottom of the skirt where the doll slides in.

tombstone.epitaph:
Paper Doll Costume, "Paper Doll Costume with Muff and Blue Cloak", 1840–60.
1840–60. Engraving with brush and watercolor on paper (machine cut?). Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-3.
